requirement_tested: Frontend application with data visualization components for basketball statistics
user_persona: A basketball fan named Alex who wants to analyze player performance trends.
user_goal: To view interactive charts showing a player's scoring trends over the season.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Player Stats
narrative_steps.description: Alex navigates to the player profile page and scrolls down to the statistics section.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the statistics visualization section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interactive charts showing the player's scoring trends appear on screen.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Chart Data Points
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks on a specific data point in the scoring trend line chart to see detailed performance for that game.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a data point in the line chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears showing detailed stats like points, rebounds, and assists for that particular game.

requirement_tested: Backend API service that connects to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer testing backend connectivity for the first time.
user_goal: Verify that the backend successfully retrieves basketball data from the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Making an API Request
narrative_steps.description: The developer sends a GET request to the matches endpoint to retrieve data.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to `/api/matches`.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The server responds with a JSON array containing match data retrieved from the PostgreSQL database.

requirement_tested: Match history browsing functionality with detailed game data
user_persona: Jordan, a sports analyst reviewing past games for research.
user_goal: Browse historical match data and view detailed box scores.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Match History
narrative_steps.description: Jordan visits the match history page and sees a timeline of past games.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the match history page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of past games is displayed in card format with teams, scores, and dates.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding Game Details
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks on a specific match card to explore more detailed information.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a match card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card expands to reveal detailed box score statistics and play-by-play data.

requirement_tested: Team rankings display with current standings and performance metrics
user_persona: Taylor, a fantasy basketball participant checking league standings.
user_goal: Check current team standings and sort by win percentage.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Team Standings
narrative_steps.description: Taylor opens the team rankings page to see the current league standings.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the team rankings page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A table showing team standings with wins, losses, and win percentages is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting Rankings
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clicks on the 'Win Percentage' column header to reorder the standings.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Win Percentage' column header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Teams are reordered from highest to lowest win percentage.

requirement_tested: Player performance tracking with statistical analysis
user_persona: Morgan, a coach evaluating player development over the season.
user_goal: Review a player's season-long performance and compare it with another player.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Player Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Morgan clicks on a player's profile to view detailed analytics.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a player card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dashboard showing season-by-season progression and advanced metrics appears.

narrative_steps.title: Comparing Players
narrative_steps.description: Morgan selects another player to compare performance side-by-side.
narrative_steps.action: Select a second player and activate comparison mode.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A side-by-side view with normalized data visualizations comparing both players appears.

requirement_tested: Match prediction algorithm with probability calculations

user_goal: Check predicted outcomes for upcoming matches with confidence levels.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Match Predictions
narrative_steps.description: Casey goes to the predictions section to see upcoming match forecasts.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the predictions page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Cards showing upcoming matches with win probabilities and confidence scores are displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Predictions
narrative_steps.description: Casey manually refreshes to get updated predictions based on latest stats.
narrative_steps.action: Click the refresh button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Probability calculations update in real-time reflecting the most recent team and player data.

requirement_tested: Betting recommendation engine based on analytical insights

narrative_steps.title: Setting Risk Preference
narrative_steps.description: Riley accesses the betting recommendations section and sets risk tolerance to moderate.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Moderate' risk tolerance setting.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Betting recommendations update instantly to reflect moderate-risk options.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Recommendation Details
narrative_steps.description: Riley clicks on a recommended bet to understand the reasoning behind it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a betting recommendation card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Detailed analysis including alternative options and historical success rates is shown.
